name: varia-redirect
description: Redirect browser downloads to a local Varia (Aria2) instance with advanced filtering.

scripts.build:firefox: VITE_BROWSER=firefox vite build && rm -rf dist-firefox && cp -r dist dist-firefox
scripts.build:chrome: VITE_BROWSER=chrome vite build && rm -rf dist-chrome && cp -r dist dist-chrome
scripts.build:all: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist-firefox && zip -r ../varia-redirect-firefox.zip .
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist-chrome && zip -r ../varia-redirect-chrome.zip .
scripts.package:all: npm run build:all && npm run package:firefox && npm run package:chrome
